alert.note: Alert for Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Western Rutland; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 3:00PM EST until January 29 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Rutland and Windsor Counties. * WHEN...From noon Sunday to noon EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute. Isolated power outages are possible with snow transitioning from wetter to drier consistency this evening and overnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Western Rutland; Western Windsor
